entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
